EDM production

In this course you will learn about musical theory in simple terms, and create unique sounds and beautiful harmonies, finally getting that music out of your head, onto paper, and into actual songs!

This course

Will help you to learn about musical theory in simple terms, and create unique sounds and beautiful harmonies, finally getting that music out of your head, onto paper, and into actual songs! Together we will go through all the problem areas in writing music. We will overcome the fear and difficulty of mixing and mastering music and, finally, learn how to finish our work, and not just accumulate tons of demos!

For whom?

DJ’s

DJs who want to develop their sound design and are looking for unusual ways to process sound.

Musicians

Musicians who are not satisfied with the sound quality of their tracks and are looking for new ways to implement their ideas.

Sound designers

Sound designers, who want to try something new and pump up their skills to the new level.

Course plan

1. Musical theory

In this part of the course you will learn the fundamental aspects of music theory. We will start by building different chords, so you’ll understand what root-note is, how to pick it up and build your chords. You will get the knowledge of melody structures and find out how different hit tunes are made in different genres. You will also learn how to get aright emotion, character, and color to your melodies and harmonies. You will learn what scales and frets are and how they can be used in your production.

2. Arrangement

These lessons will help you to better understand how electronic music is made in general. We will analyze a variety of EDM tracks and figure out the arrangements from the inside out. You are going to learn how to choose the right sounds, how to make your arrangements more dynamic and interesting with the help of various effects.

3. Mixing

This part of the course was designed to learn the mixing techniques. You will learn different types of EQ and how to use them. You will also learn more about the side-chain compression technique. The lesson about panning and audio-space will help you understand the balance in your mix correctly and how Haas effect can help you make your instruments sound «wider». Alex will also teach you Compression and everything about it, including methods and techniques.

4. Mastering

Here you will learn the basics of mastering and how to prepare your mix to go out in the world. In this part, we will analyze various plugins on the master channel, and figure out what is better for your mix and how to export your tracks properly.

Course Features

Unique samples

All sampleas and presets were designed espesially for this course.

Working with DAW

The skills of working with Ableton helps to work with any DAW.

Practical knowledge

At this course we will give you not just theory but also a practical knowladge.

About the author

My name is Alexander Adamyan aka DROHP. I am a professional DJ and sound producer. I worked with various labels. I played at more than 350 scenes including the Ibiza resort, but I mostly do ghost production. I write music for world pop-music star.
I also create dance music and sample packs. Over the past 2 years, I have written 123 ghost tracks, 40 of which were successfully issued under world-famous labels and 2 of them became world hits

No, we didn't forget about the details

Free Updates

Once you have finished the course, you will continue receiving new tutorials and updates. Isn't that awesome?

Study wherever you go

Even though we recommend using a desktop computer or a laptop, you can study on any device. But you will still need a laptop or a desktop computer to practice.

One of a kind support

We have a live chat support for you. It may not be a 24/7 support, but you can ask us any questions and we will answer you during our work hours.

Community

You will be invited to the members only private community of other students from around the world on Facebook. It's a whole bunch of people that you will have a lot in common with.

100% money back guarantee

If you're disappointed for whatever reason, you'll get every cent back within 14 days after the purchase. Only applies to the single full-price purchase of the course.
